name: worcestershire
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a county (= area with its own local government) in western central England: Alan is from Evesham in Worcestershire.
More examplesFewer examplesShe worked at the Princess of Wales Hospital in Bromsgrove, Worcestershire. He played county cricket for Worcestershire. The lush hills and valleys of Herefordshire and Worcestershire were the inspiration for Elgar's finest music. They moved to a new house in the Worcestershire countryside.
